name: Permesso di Importazione
description: Steaks, seasonal vegetables, and fresh fruit to please any soul, or a little something otherwise. The clever ones know what the famiglie want, and will ready it in advance, to be supplied when the time comes.
usage: Permits issued by the Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare to the famiglie. These grant famiglia members entry to the Dipartimento di Sicurezza Alimentare and the right to obtain goods, whether said goods fall under 'alimentare' notwithstanding.
obtainApproach: Event Stage drop, Event mission reward
